name: SuperHahn123
text: Nick the manager is the most unprofessional manager I've ever seen in my entire life. We love Pizza Hut, but they always forget parts of our order. Talk to Nick and all he said was sorry and have a good night.

name: Trevor Justus
text: I used to love pizza Hut but this time the food was just average at best. A hand tossed large is quite a bit bigger than a pan large. Both of them are too thick so you feel like you are eating a slice of french bread with toppings.  The …More

name: Neveko
text: I only used to order this crap because it was the only edible pizza that delivers to Wellington (I wouldn't even wish that garbage that the local pizza place in Wellington serves on my enemies). Well, today I found out they no longer …More

name: Susan Williams
text: I recently ordered the special 2 med., 5 toppings pizza @$6.99 a piece.  One had pineapple.  We could barely see the pineapple and NO pineapple taste.  The pieces were no bigger to smaller than my pinky finger  I saw my friend picking …More

name: thomas romero
text: We ordered a taco pizza. First time they had no beans for it. So I didn't order for me, but ordered something for my kids.  The second time the didn't include the toppings with it. Was told that's how they make them …More

name: Jonathan Hiestand
text: The order came a little later but it was only by 15 minutes.  In Foco traffic at leave work for home time, not too bad.  The pizza tasted like cardboard, it wasn't fresh, they forgot the green peppers on the pizza.  An extra star because …More

name: Barbara Higgins
text: Food was good enough....service was HORRIBLE.  The place was not at all busy and my daughter spilled a soda all over, WE cleaned it up and she (and all of us) were NEVER offered a refill!

name: Andrea Agnew
text: I hate it when they don't do a good job of getting your order right. Tonight I really wanted what I wanted. That meant paying for extra cheese. The pizza I got had little bacon nuggets or crumbs, hardly any cheese, but a fair amount of …More

name: Michael Hornbacher
text: The people here are very friendly and they have a good lunch buffet.

name: Jason Stiner
text: Pizza was very bad, no taste. Save the money and get a digornio, it tastes better.

name: Bob Harry
text: Wanted to order carry out but after being put on hold three times for more than seven minutes total I ordered from pizza casba
